meanings.sent1: She disregards the warning signs and continues on her way.
meanings.sent2: He often disregards his mother's advice and does things his own way.
meanings.sent3: The cat disregards the 'Do Not Disturb' sign and jumps on the bed.
meanings.sent4: Time disregards no one, moving forward without hesitation.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's strict demeanor disregards any attempts at excuses.

meanings.sent1: The manager disregards the complaints of the customers and focuses on profits.
meanings.sent2: She disregards the negative comments and continues to pursue her passion.
meanings.sent3: The puppy disregards the 'No Chewing' rule and gnaws on the furniture.
meanings.sent4: The storm disregards the fragile branches, breaking them with its powerful winds.
meanings.sent5: His arrogant attitude disregards the feelings of those around him.
